content: I wonder how someone can still defend a backward and cruel dictatorship such as that of Lukashenko, who has managed to have every one of his opponents beaten up and imprisoned. It's just beyond me!
translations: ita:Mi chiedo come qualcuno possa ancora difendere una dittatura retrograda e crudele come quella di Lukashenko, che Ã¨ riusc
